attributes.action: make it illegal for job application forms for jobs that require age details
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an older person who is in his 50's and looking for employment, i am constantly sent job application forms that require my age to be listed. If the potential employer is age biased then he/she knows just from application forms who to reject. If the forms are left blank employers assume that you must be an older applicant. I would like a law to make it illegal to send application forms that require age details prior to an interview.
